question: return me the paper after 2000 in Databases area with the most citations .
query: SELECT t3.title FROM DOMAIN AS t2 JOIN domain_publication AS t1 ON t2.did = t1.did JOIN publication AS t3 ON t3.pid = t1.pid WHERE t2.name = 'Databases' AND t3.year > 2000 ORDER BY t3.citation_num DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
